channel.title: LT7 on Go Conference 2021 Spring

item.title: Fabricating Community : One Byte At A Time
item.description: From founding & running non-profit tech-community & being a sole women founder in a country of social restrictions, I would love to share the importance of having tech-community & how one can build/nurture it from absolute zero. Can you help me in making a difference? Can we build a welcoming, diverse and inclusive community or can we be ONE? Allow me to share my experiences and lessonâ€™s learnt to get involved in the Go community.
